summary.description:
Open-source add-on kit for automation of zone elution in planar chromatography.

Follow this link to download an image of raspbian with the OC_manager set-up, last update: 20180605.

Shiny app to operate apparatus of office chromatography.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'TLC HPTLC-MS', 'HPTLC-MS', 'TLC', 'elution'
summary.name: OC_manager
